questions.title: Paid Job
questions.question_text: Did you have a paid job, either as an employee or self-employed, in the week 04 November to 11 November 2024?

questions.title: Job Title
questions.question_text: What is your exact job title for your main job or business?

questions.title: Job Description
questions.question_text: Describe what you do in that job or business as a PLACEHOLDER_TEXT
questions.question_description: For example, I pack crates of goods in a warehouse for a supermarket chain

questions.title: Organisation Activity
questions.question_text: At your main job, describe the main activity of the business or organisation
questions.question_description: For example, elderly residential care, food and beverage manufacturing or primary education

questions.title: Organisation Type
questions.question_text: What kind of organisation was it?

label.text: A nationalised industry or state corporation

response_options.value: A nationalised industry or state corporation

label.text: Local government or council (including fire service and local authority controlled schools or colleges)

response_options.value: Local government or council (including fire service and local authority controlled schools or colleges)

label.text: A university or other grant funded establishment (including opted-out schools)

response_options.value: A university or other grant funded establishment (including opted-out schools)

label.text: A health authority or NHS Trust

response_options.value: A health authority or NHS Trust

label.text: A charity, voluntary organisation or trust

response_options.value: A charity, voluntary organisation or trust

consent.title: Survey Assist Consent
consent.question_text: Can Survey Assist ask PLACEHOLDER_FOLLOWUP to better understand PLACEHOLDER_REASON?
consent.justification_title: Why am I being asked an automated follow-up question?
consent.justification_text:
You are only asked an automated follow-up question when we need clarity on your previous answers. By providing an answer you will help us improve the accuracy of our statistics.

You can choose to answer, give feedback on, or skip automated follow-up questions.

There is a small risk that automated follow-up questions will be inaccurate, offensive or ask for personal information. If that happens, please skip the question and give your feedback so we can improve the tool.

The AI tool uses an LLM (large language model) called Google Gemini that generates the automated follow-up questions. Your data is not stored by Google Gemini and it is not used to train Google AI models. It is only used once, for the specific purpose of creating the follow up questions.
